abstract: Former swimsuit model and television personality Brooke Burke was voted winner of the seventh edition of “Dancing With the Stars,” an announcement made during the show’s season finale Tuesday on ABC.
snippet: Former swimsuit model and television personality Brooke Burke was voted winner of the seventh edition of “Dancing With the Stars,” an announcement made during the show’s season finale Tuesday on ABC.
lead_paragraph: Former swimsuit model and television personality Brooke Burke was voted winner of the seventh edition of “Dancing With the Stars,” an announcement made during the show’s season finale Tuesday on ABC. The network easily earned the night’s most viewers over all as 20.6 million tuned in to watch the final results from 9 to 11 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
